title: Not getting ip earned for a match.
body: I played a match of aram, and ended up with 1735 ip total. I was going to buy a random champion shard, but it wont let me, stating it has not enough currency. This has happened before, when I reload the game, it resets my ip back to what it was before. If this could be fixed, thanks

replies.body:
Sometimes there can be a delay between when you get IP and when the client shows the change. Like you said, refreshing the client can force your point total to reset. I took a look at your account and was able to sync your points on our end. 

Let me know if you still don't see your IP!
